text: This is a list of all transactions occurring in the 1988-89 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July 1, 1988 to June 30, 1989), see the links below ==References== ==External links== *Basketball.RealGM.com *Basketball-Reference.com ==References== Transactions 1989-89
title: List of 1988–89 NBA season transactions
